name: Rider Master - Free moto racing game
name_original: Rider Master - Free moto racing game
description:
Unique track construction, unique extreme sports!

Fly over all obstacles and feel the excitement of extreme sports

Use the blood to ignite youth, limit all obstacles and reach the end!

Game features:
Unique racing style:
Dozens of high-end off-road vehicles, cool shape, special elastic system, you can flexibly deal with most obstacles, complete special stunts! Drive your favorite vehicle for a thrilling stunt show!

Upgrade your body configuration and experience the ultimate car experience!
Stunning 3D realistic graphics, special sound effects and background music for more fun
Challenge the impossible track of motorcycles to perform amazing jumps and bounces.
Complete a series of challenges in an impossible track to become a world-class motorized technician!

A variety of unique levels:
Each level requires a certain skill to pass, fully test your reaction and resilience, a variety of obstacles, absolutely beyond your imagination! Complete the stunts again and again, let everyone cheer for you, and use your extraordinary skills to complete one difficult and elegant action! Become the strongest stunt driver!
Blooming your own light on the track!
